colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI, NGES PA DON GYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN TSE 'DI BLOS BTANG ZHING TSE PHYI MA DON DU GNYER BA, TSANGS PA BRGYA BYIN GYI GO SA MING BTAGS SHVA BA'I RMI LAM DU MTHONG BA'I BYA BRAL BA TSUL KHRIMS RNAM RGYAL GYI ZHABS LA RJES SU BZUNG BA RGYAL KHAMS PA DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL 'JAM 'PHRIN NO,, ,,
